h2.span: World Class Progressive Education for the Children of Harlem

div.h6: is a progressive K-12 charter school network in Harlem affiliated with the Progressive Education Institute. We are passionate about creating a rich intellectual life for students as well as teachers.

iframe.title: Our Teachers Talk About What Makes HVA Different

blockquote.p: An end which is the child’s own carries him to achieve the means of its accomplishment.
One schoolmaster made the remark, ‘I have no faith in this boy.’ Dr. Reinhardt said to him, ‘Then you have no right to educate him.’ Each boy or girl entrusted to our care is capable.
Authentic tests are contextualized, complex intellectual challenges that stress depth over breadth.
Are we forming children who are only capable of learning what is already known or should we try to develop creative and innovative minds?
Any fool can know. The point is to understand.

div.p: We are deeply committed to progressive education while emphatically embracing a sense of urgency, a strong work ethic, and accountability for student learning.
We hold ourselves accountable for creating learning experiences that inspire and require the highest levels of intellectual sophistication.

Every child who attends HVA is unique, and has the unwavering support of our family of educators, deans, social workers, mentors, and faculty, all guided by the mandate that the needs of the student come first.

div.h6: We are a community of educators deeply committed to the ideals of progressive education. We hold ourselves accountable for creating learning experiences that inspire and require the highest levels of intellectual sophistication, and we aspire to learn, live, and work in schools that reflect our philosophy.
